We generally ask this question when something has happened which we don't like. Well one thing is a fact that everything cannot happen according to our wishes. There are actually very few things which happen as we have wished. But even in those there are some minor lackings. Now what is the solution? One is to curse your destiny as to why it happened. What I did wrong so that this happened to me and all that silly stuff. Another is to correct the course. Rectify your own mistakes and learn from them so that in future these mistakes are not repeated. If it was not your mistake and your compulsions and condition led to this then improving your condition can help. And if someone did this to you then to show strength. Forgive and move on. As time will pass by you will realize that all these have become less important to you and you have become even more mature and stronger. So no nothing ever happens for good or bad. It is we who have to make the best out of everything.
